title: Object - Stock Issuance Transaction
description: Object describing a stock issuance transaction by the issuer and held by a stakeholder

stock_class_id.description: Identifier of the stock class for this stock issuance

share_price.description: The price per share paid for the stock by the holder

quantity.description: Number of shares issued to the stakeholder

vesting_rules.description: Vesting conditions applicable to this stock

cost_basis.description: The cost basis for this particular stock

stock_legend_ids.title: Stock Issuance - Stock Legend ID Array
stock_legend_ids.description: List of stock legend ids that apply to this stock
